metadata.title: CVE-2019-19847 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
Libspiro through 20190731 has a stack-based buffer overflow in the spiro_to_bpath0() function in spiro.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspiro1 - 1:20200505-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspiro package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:20200505-2').
